title: Stage Lv10-S40
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Well... I think I need to think about it.
Hmm, I don't think it'll work out in that direction.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 글쎄요... 좀 생각해봐야 할 것 같은데요.
sentences.en: Well... I think I need to think about it.

sentences.kr: 음, 그런 방향으로는 잘 안 될 것 같아요.
sentences.en: Hmm, I don't think it'll work out in that direction.

sentences.kr: 아, 그게... 좀 복잡한 사정이 있어서요.
sentences.en: Oh, that's... there are some complicated circumstances.

sentences.kr: 제가 그런 쪽으로는 별로... 어떨지 모르겠어요.
sentences.en: I'm not really into that kind of thing... I'm not sure.

sentences.kr: 다른 대안은 없을까요? 그게 조금 더...
sentences.en: Isn't there another alternative? That would be a bit more...

sentences.kr: 시기가 좀 그렇지 않나요? 다음 기회에...
sentences.en: Isn't the timing a bit off? Maybe next time...

sentences.kr: 제 성향하고는 좀 안 맞는 것 같아서요.
sentences.en: It doesn't seem to match my personality.

sentences.kr: 좋긴 한데, 뭔가 확신이 안 서네요.
sentences.en: It's good, but I'm not quite convinced about something.
